taskdescription:
Synopsis:  Utility that writes data to a file\
\
Input param:  \
filename = File name to write to.  MAKE SURE that the file is writable by the web server user, we recommend you write to /var/www/html/nochero/tmp/files\
data = The data you are writing into the file.  The utility adds a new line char already\
\
Output param:  status\
Output values:  saved, <error, something like Cannot write to...>\
\
Sample Params Config (fill in over on the left): \
{\
"filename":"/var/www/html/nochero/tmp/files/cooloutput.txt",\
"data":"Some data or a wfv usually"\
}
